text: The hairy water lily or pink water-lily (Nymphaea pubescens) is a species of water lily. It is the Official National flower of Bangladesh respectively. ==Heraldry== National emblem of Bangladesh.svg|National emblem of BangladeshConstitution Of The People's Republic Of Bangladesh (1972-present) ==References== Category:Plants of Asia Category:Nymphaeales Category:Aquatic plants Category:National symbols of Bangladesh
title: Nymphaea pubescens
